sentences.sContent: Their taste for gambling has endeared them to Las Vegas casino owners.
sentences.sCn: 他们对赌博的爱好使其受到了拉斯韦加斯赌场老板们的欢迎。

remMethod.val: en(使) + dear(珍爱的) → 使受喜爱

words.tran: 可爱的；讨人喜欢的；引起爱情的

trans.tranOther: If something endears you to someone or if you endear yourself to them, you become popular with them and well liked by them
